front.title: Survey on IP-based Vehicular Networking for Intelligent Transportation Systems

abstract.t: This document surveys the IP-based vehicular networks, which are considered a key component of Intelligent Transportation Systems (ITS). The main topics of vehicular networking are vehicle-to- vehicle (V2V), vehicle-to-infrastructure (V2I), and infrastructure- to-vehicle (I2V) networking. Vehicular networks deal with some critical aspects, such as IP address autoconfiguration, routing, handover, and mobility management. This document summarizes and analyzes the previous research activities that use IPv4 or IPv6 for vehicular networking"
